greeting: What can Kodely do for you?

task.title: Task
task.closeAndStart: Close task and start a new one
task.delete: Delete Task (Shift + Click to skip confirmation)

onboarding: Your task list in this workspace is empty. Start by typing in a task below. Not sure how to begin? Read more about what Kodely can do for you in the docs.
enhancePromptDescription: The 'Enhance Prompt' button helps improve your prompt by providing additional context, clarification, or rephrasing. Try typing a prompt in here and clicking the button again to see how it works.
addContext: @ to add context, / to switch modes
dragFiles: hold shift to drag in files
dragFilesImages: hold shift to drag in files/images

checkpoint.initializingWarning: Still initializing checkpoint... If this takes too long, you can disable checkpoints in <settingsLink>settings</settingsLink> and restart your task.

menu.restoreFilesDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point.
menu.restoreFilesAndTaskDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point and deletes all messages after this point.

instructions.wantsToFetch: Kodely wants to fetch detailed instructions to assist with the current task

fileOperations.wantsToRead: Kodely wants to read this file:
fileOperations.wantsToReadOutsideWorkspace: Kodely wants to read this file outside of the workspace:
fileOperations.wantsToEdit: Kodely wants to edit this file:
fileOperations.wantsToEditOutsideWorkspace: Kodely wants to edit this file outside of the workspace:
fileOperations.wantsToCreate: Kodely wants to create a new file:
fileOperations.wantsToSearchReplace: Kodely wants to search and replace in this file:
fileOperations.didSearchReplace: Kodely performed search and replace on this file:
fileOperations.wantsToInsert: Kodely wants to insert content into this file:
fileOperations.wantsToInsertWithLineNumber: Kodely wants to insert content into this file at line {{lineNumber}}:
fileOperations.wantsToInsertAtEnd: Kodely wants to append content to the end of this file:

directoryOperations.wantsToViewTopLevel: Kodely wants to view the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewTopLevel: Kodely viewed the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewRecursive: Kodely wants to recursively view all files in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewRecursive: Kodely recursively viewed all files in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewDefinitions: Kodely wants to view source code definition names used in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewDefinitions: Kodely viewed source code definition names used in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToSearch: Kodely wants to search this directory for {{regex}}:

mcp.wantsToUseTool: Kodely wants to use a tool on the {{serverName}} MCP server:
mcp.wantsToAccessResource: Kodely wants to access a resource on the {{serverName}} MCP server:

modes.wantsToSwitch: Kodely wants to switch to {{mode}} mode
modes.wantsToSwitchWithReason: Kodely wants to switch to {{mode}} mode because: {{reason}}

subtasks.wantsToCreate: Kodely wants to create a new subtask in {{mode}} mode:
subtasks.wantsToFinish: Kodely wants to finish this subtask
subtasks.defaultResult: Please continue to the next task.
subtasks.completionInstructions: Subtask completed! You can review the results and suggest any corrections or next steps. If everything looks good, confirm to return the result to the parent task.

shellIntegration.troubleshooting: Still having trouble? Click here for shell integration documentation.
shellIntegration.checkSettings: Check terminal workarounds in the settings page
shellIntegration.supportedShell: Make sure you're using a supported shell: zsh, bash, fish, or PowerShell

powershell.issues: It seems like you're having Windows PowerShell issues, please see this

autoApprove.title: Auto-approve:
autoApprove.description: Auto-approve allows Kodely to perform actions without asking for permission. Only enable for actions you fully trust. More detailed configuration available in <settingsLink>Settings</settingsLink>.

announcement.title: ðŸŽ‰ Roo Code 3.14 Released
announcement.description: Roo Code 3.14 brings new features and improvements based on your feedback.
announcement.feature1: Improved Editing Tools: The search_and_replace and insert_content tools have been improved and graduated from experimental status
announcement.feature2: Diff Apply Fixes: We continue to work on improving the apply_diff tool
announcement.feature3: <bold>Tons of Other Improvements</bold>: Numerous fixes and enhancements throughout the extension
announcement.detailsDiscussLinks: Get more details and discuss in <discordLink>Discord</discordLink> and <redditLink>Reddit</redditLink> ðŸš€

followUpSuggest.copyToInput: Copy to input (same as shift + click)

browser.rooWantsToUse: Kodely wants to use the browser:

systemPromptWarning: WARNING: Custom system prompt override active. This can severely break functionality and cause unpredictable behavior.
